entry.title: Construction on Windows 10
entry.summary:
Backup is important when your laptop won't wake up. Furthermore, HD decryption takes a long time and not guarantee to recover totally. That's why I have the chance to write this construction note : p Here is my step to install FW tool on Win 10!

Installation

Backup data

  • robocopy \$SRC \$DST /mir /R:0 /W:0 /FFT /A-:SH

Required software

  • APP: Dynamic theme
  • Exceed onDemand Client
  • Evernote
  • Notepad++
  • Bash on Ubuntu(WSL), gcc compiler, Issue: apt-get --fix-missing
    • Ubuntu file system root
    • gcc, python, python3, perl, rsync
    • bash: Bad Substitution, ssh: Resource temporarily unavailable, usr local bin
    • apt-get install bc, libspreadsheet-parseexcel-perl

Check out Firewall blocks updates to the Windows 10 Linux sub-system feature when you see the error ssh: connect to host tiger.synaptics.com port 22: Resource temporarily unavailable. There is one workaround to disable firewall via $MYPROGRAMFILE/Symantec Endpoint Protection/Smc.exe -disable -ntp

  • Windows Git
  • Beyond compare
  • Visual studio 2013/2012
  • Matlab 2016/2015
  • VS code
  • Git extension
  • P4merge
  • Docker
  • Git Extension
  • TortoiseGit
  • ZEROPLUS
  • DediProg

Set up ssh key

  • If you have one, just copy it from your old .ssh
  • How to set up ssh key
  • Managing multiple keys
